thread.section_title: Room Mate Grace - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent stay
thread.title_full: Excellent stay - Review of Room Mate Grace, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: bec1011
title: Excellent stay
text:
This is a lovely hotel. The decor is fab, the breakfast was lovely and the staff are very friendly and helpful. A special mention to Marc who helped me and my friend get the supershuttle booked - thanks so much!
The bed was the best I've ever slept in at a hotel. The room was kept very clean and has everything you need. The shower was very powerful and was lovely to jump into after the cold days out!
We were kept waiting for our room to be ready for quite a while but was rewarded with an upgrade to a nice big room - this was perfect and we would like to pass on our thanks for the very kind gesture.
Thanks for a wonderful stay and we hope to be back soon. Becca and Katie xx
